trans-unit.source: In this section we will modify the model of our database by adding a new timestamp field named CompleteDate.
trans-unit.target: In this section we will modify the model of our database by adding a new timestamp field named CompleteDate.

trans-unit.source: This field will record the last time the todo item was completed.
trans-unit.target: This field will record the last time the todo item was completed.

trans-unit.source: Entity Framework will update the database based on our model change using a default database initializer class derived from <linkText>DropCreateDatabaseIfModelChanges</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Entity Framework will update the database based on our model change using a default database initializer class derived from <linkText>DropCreateDatabaseIfModelChanges</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: In Solution Explorer for Visual Studio, expand the App_Start folder in the todolist service project.
trans-unit.target: In Solution Explorer for Visual Studio, expand the App_Start folder in the todolist service project.

trans-unit.source: Open the WebApiConfig.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Open the WebApiConfig.cs file.

trans-unit.source: In the WebApiConfig.cs file, notice that your default database initializer class is derived from the DropCreateDatabaseIfModelChanges class.
trans-unit.target: In the WebApiConfig.cs file, notice that your default database initializer class is derived from the DropCreateDatabaseIfModelChanges class.

trans-unit.source: This means any change to the model will result in the table being dropped and recreated to accommodate the new model.
trans-unit.target: This means any change to the model will result in the table being dropped and recreated to accommodate the new model.

trans-unit.source: So the data in the table will be lost and the table will be re-seeded.
trans-unit.target: So the data in the table will be lost and the table will be re-seeded.

trans-unit.source: Modify the Seed method of the database initializer so that the seed data is as follows as save the WebApiConfig.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Modify the Seed method of the database initializer so that the seed data is as follows as save the WebApiConfig.cs file.

trans-unit.source: When using the default database initializer, Entity Framework will drop and recreate the database whenever it detects a data model change in the Code First model definition.
trans-unit.target: When using the default database initializer, Entity Framework will drop and recreate the database whenever it detects a data model change in the Code First model definition.

trans-unit.source: To make this data model change and maintain existing data in the database, you must use Code First Migrations.
trans-unit.target: To make this data model change and maintain existing data in the database, you must use Code First Migrations.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <linkText>How to Use Code First Migrations to Update the Data Model</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <linkText>How to Use Code First Migrations to Update the Data Model</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: In Solution Explorer for Visual Studio, expand the DataObjects folder in the todolist service project.
trans-unit.target: In Solution Explorer for Visual Studio, expand the DataObjects folder in the todolist service project.

trans-unit.source: Open the TodoItem.cs file and update the TodoItem class to include the CompleteDate field as follows.
trans-unit.target: Open the TodoItem.cs file and update the TodoItem class to include the CompleteDate field as follows.

trans-unit.source: Then save the TodoItem.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Then save the TodoItem.cs file.

trans-unit.source: In Solution Explorer for Visual Studio, expand the Controllers folder in the todolist service project.
trans-unit.target: In Solution Explorer for Visual Studio, expand the Controllers folder in the todolist service project.

trans-unit.source: Open the TodoItemController.cs file and update the PatchTodoItem method so that it will set the CompleteDate when the Complete property is changing from false to true.
trans-unit.target: Open the TodoItemController.cs file and update the PatchTodoItem method so that it will set the CompleteDate when the Complete property is changing from false to true.

trans-unit.source: Then save the TodoItemController.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Then save the TodoItemController.cs file.

trans-unit.source: Rebuild the todolist .NET backend service project and verify that you have no build errors.
trans-unit.target: Rebuild the todolist .NET backend service project and verify that you have no build errors.

trans-unit.source: Next, you will update the client app to display the new CompleteDate data.
trans-unit.target: Next, you will update the client app to display the new CompleteDate data.
